title: Samuel's Way
description: Samuel's Way is a young adult fiction about a teenager, Annie, who is sent to live with an aunt she never knew existed in rural Pennsylvania. Her mother is on trial for murder and Annie herself may hold the key to her freedom. She falls in love with Samuel, an Amish boy, while trying to balance her ideas of what is survival or truth? This book is a raw tale of a girl who is forced to face up to her past. It contains strong language and some adult situations. Recommended for readers aged 16+
author: Elaine Westley
